description:
At the end of a quiet cul-de-sac and tucked away from street view, sits this show-stopping family home that offers a rare opportunity - a north-facing deep waterfront, complete with a private boat ramp, a level grassed yard, pool, and pool house. Inside is filled with natural light while large windows and smart design shows-off that breath-taking view from almost every room. Stacker doors lead to the entertainer's balcony and bring the outside in, allowing you to further enjoy the resort-style vibes. The thoughtful dual level design makes the most of the space, catering to modern family living with multiple living/dining spaces, plenty of storage, and a versatile floor plan that can easily accommodate a home office or studio with a view.

This luxurious property plays the perfect backdrop for family celebrations, summer BBQs with friends and lazy days spent enjoying that uninterrupted view from sunrise to sunset.

Why you'll love it -
• Rare opportunity to secure a north-facing waterfront in the Sutherland Shire.
• Private and peaceful - positioned at the end of a cul-de-sac and away from street view.
• Stunning panoramic views across the Georges River.
• Timber floors flow through the open plan air-conditioned living and dining room.
• Stacker doors effortlessly combine the living room with the covered entertainer's balcony, complete with café style roller blinds.
• Modern kitchen with plenty of storage, stone bench top and integrated dishwasher.
• Rumpus room or second living room on the lower level of the home that opens to another large deck.
• Four spacious bedrooms all with built-in wardrobes.
• A versatile fifth bedroom with wardrobe - ideal as a home office with balcony access and river views.
• Two modern bathrooms, one on each level of the home. The family bathroom includes a spa bath.
• Great sized laundry and plenty of subfloor storage.
• Beautiful level grassed yard flows to the in-ground pool and onto the water's edge.
• The boathouse conversion provides another amazing outdoor living space and plenty of storage while the boat ramp offers private access to the Georges River.
• Off street parking for multiple cars.
• Family friendly location within close proximity to Oyster Bay Public School, shops and bus stop.
• A truly rare opportunity not to be missed.
• Quarterly rates - Council $866, Water $160.
• Land size - 506sqm.
